thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Cybergun H1 Current Operating Result Narrows To Loss of 0.6 Million Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Cybergun H1 Current Operating Result Narrows To Loss of 0.6 Million Euros
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - CYBERGUN SA:
* H1 EUROPE REVENUE EUR 8.0 MILLION VERSUS EUR 7.6 MILLION YEAR AGO
* H1 EUROPE RECURRING OPERATING LOSS EUR 0.4 MILLION VERSUS LOSS EUR 2.6 MILLION YEAR AGO
* H1 EUROPE RESTATED EBITDA LOSS OF EUR 0.8 MILLION VERSUS LOSS OF EUR 1.6 MILLION YEAR AGO
* H1 GROUP CONSOLIDATED NET LOSS EUR 4.0 MILLION VERSUS LOSS EUR 3.4 MILLION YEAR AGO
* H1 GROUP CURRENT OPERATING LOSS EUR 0.6 MILLION VERSUS LOSS EUR 1.4 MILLION YEAR AGO
* H1 GROUP REVENUE EUR 16.7 MILLION VERSUS EUR 18.7 MILLION YEAR AGO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
